reviewText: First time I have ever found a video of Jan Karon, whom my mother adores. I randomly found this just a few days before Mother's Day and was hoping to send it as a gift. The seller is awesome--I emailed them to ask if it was possible to arrive on time and they emailed back immediately and got it in the mail the same day so it was actually a day early. Would love to see other Jan Karon lectures, she's wonderful! :)
